Click the 'Weibo' icon to open the app.
Click the "+" button to open the options menu for posting content.
Click "Post" to create a new Weibo post.
Type "hello world，我是一个机器人" into the "What's on your mind?" text field to compose a new Weibo post.
Type "hello world，我是一个机器人" into the text field for the new Weibo post.
